author.name: Andreas Welsch
author.title: Top 10 AI Advisor | Author: “AI Leadership Handbook” | Thought Leader | Keynote SpeakerTop 10 AI Advisor | Author: “AI Leadership Handbook” | Thought Leader | Keynote Speaker

content: Are your AI initiatives falling short of expectations? In this week’s episode of the “What’s the BUZZ?” podcast, I sit down with Maxim Ioffe, a leader in driving automation for a Fortune 200 company, to explore how organizations can navigate the complexities of AI governance. Here’s what you’ll learn: 𝟭) 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗰 𝗔𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗻𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 Learn why aligning your AI strategy with business goals is essential and why building an autonomous enterprise shouldn't overshadow the company's core values centered around people. 𝟮) 𝗘𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗲 𝗔𝗜 Discover why having a robust funding strategy is key and how realistic budgeting can ignite AI projects, ensuring that your grand plans don’t remain mere dreams. 𝟯) 𝗚𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗮𝘀 𝗮 𝗖𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘀𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 Hear how an effective governance framework can turn IT into an innovation engine and allow for seamless integration of AI initiatives, minimizing friction between business and technology teams. 𝟰) 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗻𝘂𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗘𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 Discover how employees can understand the technology, identify where it can add value in their processes, and build an innovation pipeline. If you're a senior leader struggling with AI adoption in your organization, this episode is a must-listen. Subscribe to “What’s the BUZZ?” and catch this conversation tonight at 8pm ET: https://lnkd.in/dibKpBRbWho “owns” AI in your company?—Data, IT, Technology, etc.?hashtag#ArtificialIntelligence hashtag#GenerativeAI hashtag#Leadership hashtag#IntelligenceBriefing

comments.content: AI potential is incredible, but alignment with core values truly makes a difference.

author.name: Ahmad Syed Anwar

comments.content: Andreas Welsch, aligning AI with core values is vital for true impact.

author.name: Dr. Jonathan Luckett, D.Sc.
author.title: Doctor of Science in Cybersecurity | AI & Tech Thought Leader | Host of AI Ascent Podcast | Exploring the Future of AI & Automation

comments.content: Aligning AI strategy with the core values of the business is crucial, and ensuring adequate funding is the backbone to turning those ambitions into reality. I’m especially intrigued by how governance can serve as a catalyst for innovation. Andreas Welsch

author.name: Fred Lardaro
author.title: Ask me about SkyBell... self-monitoring Wi-Fi video doorbell security with one-touch 911... that helps make a smart home safer and more secure and more aware... and... smarter.

comments.content: Andreas Welsch... I don't feel like a failure with AI. Let me tell you why. I learn from people like you who curate content in ways in which I am comfortable and inspired... and your guests and I regularly follow others who create content in the language of strategy and critical thinking. And I play with AI with all the curiousness inside me. The Product Manager in me has been appreciating your sharing about funding projects and pricing. While people are solving business needs with new methods and AI systems... it is easy to forget about costs that mount from processes... while you might be looking the other way. Just sayin'. Keep up the good work.

author.name: Aaron Lax
author.title: Info Systems Coordinator, Technologist and Futurist, Thinkers360 Thought Leader and CSI Group Founder. Manage The Intelligence Community and The Dept of Homeland Security LinkedIn Groups. Advisor

comments.content: That preview of this week’s “What’s the BUZZ?” episode on AI governance is spot on. It emphasizes the importance of strategic alignment, realistic funding, governance frameworks as catalysts for innovation, and continuous education for employees. By aligning AI strategy with business goals and values and securing proper funding and oversight, organizations can turn AI initiatives into sustainable growth engines. Maxim Ioffe’s practical roadmap provides leaders with clear guidance to embed AI responsibly and accelerate adoption across their teams. Thanks Andreas Welsch

author.name: Dr. Dorine Rivers, PhD, PMP 🌎
author.title: Entrepreneur | AI Generative SaaS Development | Key Note Speaker | Best-Selling Author | Adventure Seeker

comments.content: This is a fantastic overview of the challenges and strategies in AI governance! I appreciate the emphasis on aligning AI initiatives with core business values—it's crucial for sustainable success.
